member.name: M:JG.FinTechTest.Controllers.GiftAidController.GetGiftAidAmount(JG.FinTechTest.Domain.Requests.GetGiftAidAmountRequest)
member.summary: Get the amount of gift aid reclaimable for donation amount
member.response: Returns donationAmount together with calculated giftAid amount.
Amount provided is not in the range of valid amount.
